name: webpack-starter-development

scripts.//: provides a simple web server and the ability to use live reloading

author: 'navinprasadk' <'navinprasad0808@gmail.com'>
description: This boilerplate contains webpack, the webpack configuration is specially designed for development environment not for production

devDependencies.//: It is a wrapper that will emit files processed by webpack to a server. This is used in webpack-dev-server internally
